channel.title: Firststeps on MapsIndoors Developers

item.title: MapsIndoors First Steps
item.description: Setup Google maps API You need to setup the Google Maps API in your project by following the steps in this links below depending on which platform you are using : Web : You will need the Google Maps JavaScript API. Android : You will need the Google Maps Android API. iOS : You will need the Google Maps SDK for iOS. Some Web Service APIs are needed also for the mapsIndoors SDK so make sure to enable them when getting your key :
